AI Prompt Engineering

Master the art of crafting effective prompts to get the most out of your AI automation.

Course Overview

Course Duration

4 weeks (16 hours)

Modules4
Total Lessons20

Target Audience

  • AI enthusiasts looking to improve their prompt crafting skills
  • Business professionals using AI tools for content creation
  • Developers integrating AI into applications
  • MCP server administrators optimizing AI workflows

What You'll Learn

  • Understand how language models interpret and respond to prompts
  • Craft clear, specific prompts that generate desired outputs
  • Apply prompt engineering techniques for different use cases
  • Implement prompt templates for consistent results
  • +3 more objectives

Prerequisites

  • Basic understanding of AI and language models
  • Familiarity with MCP servers (MCP Server Fundamentals course recommended)
  • Experience using AI tools like ChatGPT or Claude

Course Highlights

Interactive Exercises

Practice your prompt engineering skills with hands-on exercises and real-time feedback.

Prompt Templates

Access a library of proven prompt templates for different use cases and industries.

MCP Integration

Learn how to integrate optimized prompts with CloudDogg MCP servers for maximum efficiency.

Prompt Library

Build and manage your own library of effective prompts for different business needs.

Performance Metrics

Learn how to measure and optimize the effectiveness of your prompts with key metrics.

About the Instructor

John is a veteran and senior MCP engineer with over 10 years of experience in AI automation. After serving in the Army for 8 years, he transitioned to the tech industry where he has helped hundreds of businesses implement MCP servers and automation workflows. He specializes in helping veteran-owned businesses leverage technology to scale their operations.

Areas of Expertise

MCP Server ArchitectureAI AutomationZapier IntegrationBusiness Process Optimization
